text:
Company: Shaw-Chapman
Role: Molder

We're seeking a skilled Molder to join our team! As a Molder at Shaw-Chapman, you'll be responsible for operating and maintaining molding machinery to produce high-quality goods. If you're a detail-oriented problem solver with a strong work ethic, we want to hear from you.

Responsibilities:

 Operate and maintain molding machinery to ensure efficient production
 Monitor and adjust molding processes to meet quality standards
 Collaborate with team members to achieve production goals
 Perform routine maintenance tasks to prevent equipment downtime

Qualifications and Experience:

 2+ years of experience in a manufacturing environment
 Strong understanding of molding processes and machinery
 Ability to lift up to 50 pounds and stand for long periods
 High school diploma or equivalent required

Perks and Benefits:

 We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $45,000 to $60,000 USD, based on your experience and skills.
 Comprehensive health and dental benefits
 Opportunities for professional development and growth
